original: Ime kho panāyyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
analyzed: ime kho panāyyāyo sattarasa saṅgha ādisesāḥ dhammāḥ uddesam āgacchanti

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghassa udositaṁ datvā kālaṅkato hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ upāsakaḥ bhikkhuni saṅghassa udositam da tvā kālaṅkataḥ hoti

original: eko assaddho appasanno, eko saddho pasanno.
analyzed: ekaḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ ekaḥ saddhaḥ pasanno

original: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam etat avoca

original: Evaṁ vutte, so saddho pasanno taṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: evam vutte saḥ saddhaḥ pasannaḥ tam assaddham appasannam etat avoca
amhākam pitunā bhikkhuni saṅghassa dinno ti

original: Dutiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam etat avoca

original: Atha kho so saddho pasanno taṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ saddhaḥ pasannaḥ tam assaddham appasannam etat avoca
amhākam pitunā bhikkhuni saṅghassa dinno ti

original: Tatiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ tam saddham pasannam etat avoca
sace mayham bhavissati aham pi bhikkhuni saṅghassa dassāmi iti

original: Atha kho so udosito tehi bhājīyamāno tassa assaddhassa appasannassa pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ udositaḥ tehi bhājīyamāno tassa assaddhassa appasannassa pāpuṇāti

original: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avoca

original: Evaṁ vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: evam vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī tam purisam etat avoca

original: “māyyo, evaṁ avaca, tumhākaṁ pitunā bhikkhunisaṅghassa dinno”ti.
analyzed: evam avaca tumhākam pitunā bhikkhuni saṅghassa dinnaḥ ti
kaḥ ayye jānāti bhikkhuni saṅghassa dinnaḥ ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, thullanandā bhikkhunī te mahāmatte etadavoca—
analyzed: evam vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī te mahāmatte etat avoca

original: “api nāyyā tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā sakkhiṁ ṭhapayitvā dānaṁ diyyamānan”ti?
analyzed: api nāyyā tumhehi diṭṭham vā sutam vā sakkhim ṭhapayitvā dānam diyyamānanti

original: “saccaṁ kho ayyā āhā”ti taṁ udositaṁ bhikkhunisaṅghassa akaṁsu.
analyzed: saccam kho ayyā āha ati tam udositam bhikkhuni saṅghassa akasu

original: Atha kho so puriso parājito ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ parājitaḥ ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti
thullanandā bhikkhunī mahāmattānam etam attham ārocesi

original: Atha kho so puriso daṇḍito bhikkhunupassayassa avidūre ājīvakaseyyaṁ kārāpetvā ājīvake uyyojesi—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ daṇḍitaḥ bhikkhunu passayassa avidūre ājīvaka seyyam kārāpetvā ājīvake uyyojesi
thullanandā bhikkhunī mahāmattānam etam attham ārocesi

original: “paṭhamaṁ bhikkhuniyo udositaṁ acchindāpesuṁ, dutiyaṁ daṇḍāpesuṁ, tatiyaṁ bandhāpesuṁ.
analyzed: paṭhamam bhikkhuniyaḥ udositam acchindāpesu dutiyam daṇḍāpesu tatiyam bandhāpesu

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā ussaya vādikā viharissati iti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharatī”ti.
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī ussaya vādikā viharati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī ussaya vādikā viharissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ussaya vādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapati puttena vā dāsena

original: vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi, ayaṁ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṁ
analyzed: vā kammakārena vā antamasaḥ samaṇa paribbājakena api ayam bhikkhunī paṭhama āpattika
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇerañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno.
analyzed: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇerañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yaḥ koci paribbājaka samāpannaḥ

original: Aḍḍaṁ karissāmīti dutiyaṁ vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aḍḍam karissāmi iti dutiyam vā pariyesati gacchati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: saṅghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṁ deti mūlāya paṭikassati abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ uva tassā āpattiyāḥ mānattam deti mūlāya paṭikassati abbheti na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī tena vuccati saṅgha ādisesaḥ ti

original: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Tenapi vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: tassa eva āpatti nikāyassa nāma kammaṃ tena api vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti
